title: River Spirit Nami bug
body: So there's this bug on the River Spirit Nami skin. when she's moving or standing still part of her tail and armor is missing. Someone made a post about this on reddit, and they also have some screenshots to prove it so I'm gonna post it here.{{champion:267}}

replies.body:
Hey Keeita! 

Thanks for the report! I remember seeing this a bit ago - lemme check the status of the issue. ^-^
Hey Katey, any news? It's been like 4 months and the bug is still there :( {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

Hey! 

Sorry for the delay! This should be fixed with patch 7.1. :)

Thank you for fixing it! Unfortunately there seems to be a visual bug on Deep Sea Nami now. :( The front part of her hair is missing.

EDIT: I saw another player's post about the bug just now and also your reply to it. Sorry to bother, especially now when there seem to be so many problems :( Good luck in fixing them!

Not a bother at all! It never hurts to poke me about something. :) I log all the issues for skins that come in, but it's a bit tricky to keep an eye on everything. 

But yeah, we are aware of the Deep Sea Nami issue (looks like weighting, and was likely caused by the other Nami fix. D:) I know we had a dev working on it, but lemme follow up on the status. I don't believe the fix will be in for the upcoming patch, but I can ask to prioritize for the one after (7.3).
